turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I need to order some pizzas from the Random Lake Pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay that's the Random Lake Pizzeria, in Random Lake, WI?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes thats correct. I need to order for my whole family tonight.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good! How many pizzas will you be ordering?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Tommy's Special and The Depot specialty pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What sizes?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make them both large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Are you ordering any sides?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Add a Cheese Ring and a Ring of Fire.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I know you like to order salad, should I add an Antipasto salad?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, no salad tonight.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Should I order any drinks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll get two 2-liters of soda.One Coke and one Root Beer.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I have that down. I see they also offer pints of homemade custard.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What flavors do they have right now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Butter Pecan and vanilla.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. I'll add a pint of Butter Pecan.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will that be all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. So I have a large Tommy's special and a Large Depot pizza, as well as a cheese ring a ring of fire, a two liter of coke and a two liter of rootbeer. Finally a pint of Butter Pecan.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thats correct!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay your order is confirmed and will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes. Your receipt will be sent to your cell phone.
